thread.title: Girl's gushing tribute to her male mate quickly becomes 'most tragic friend zone ever'
thread.title_full: Girl's gushing tribute to her male mate quickly becomes 'most tragic friend zone ever'

author: Zahra Mulroy
title: Girl's gushing tribute to her male mate quickly becomes 'most tragic friend zone ever'
text:
Girl's gushing tribute to her male mate quickly becomes 'most tragic friend zone ever' One of the most awkward things you will read today Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Throughout history, some of the most memorable stories have been ones about unrequited love . 
The Phantom of the Opera, Gone with the Wind, The Great Gatsby - we're suckers for someone else's romantic misery, delighting as they pine for someone who just sees them as a good mate. 
Also known in this modern age as 'friend zoning', it's a bleak, sub-zero place to be. 
Should you need a reminder of this, one lad's 'mate date' with his friend, Alex, has made a lot of people feel emotional. "The most tragic friend zone ever." 
The young man below, Daniel, dressed in his courting finery, clearly put a lot of thought and effort into this day out Alex. 
In what was an enthusiastic tribute to Daniel and the hard work he's put in to cheering her up, Alex wrote a gushing Instagram post saying: 
"From Top Golf, to dinner, flowers, ice cream and Horseback riding, you out-did yourself on this friend date Daniel! 
"You wanted to set a standard for how I should be treated and you sure set a high one. 
"I thank God so much that He put an amazing friend like you in my life. 
"Thank you for making me feel like a true princess! #stillsingletho." 
#stillsingletho seems like a particularly harsh editorial choice. 
Needless to say, the sympathy for Daniel quickly mounted. Read More Even 'Salt Bae' made an appearance. 
We doubt Salt Bae has ever been friend zoned in his life. 
However, there were reactions to the post which were very unkind about the girl in the photo, going beyond a joke - which supposedly prompted Daniel to speak out on her behalf. 
So that's all cleared up now. 
Whoever you are Daniel, you're a true gentleman. Read More
